name: On The Pink Wings Of Love - Prologue
name_original: On The Pink Wings Of Love - Prologue
description:
Bachelor Dave cannot believe his luck, when he wins a trip on the prestigious cruise ship The Pink Swan. Finally things seem to be going his way!

Now all he has to do is enjoy his month long cruise and maybe if he’s lucky, find love along the way. He’s definitely not qualified to solve a murder, but then again, why would he need to be, this is just a completely normal, relaxing trip.

On The Pink Wings Of Love is a  FBL (flamingo boys love) visual novel, with absolutely no murder mystery elements. Get to know a large cast of characters, woo your love interests and uncover their secrets. Only the prologue is currently playable.

(Note: Take none of this seriously)
